response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your unique needs and exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting over a decade of innovation and expertise in its development. We are confident that it will bring significant benefits to you, given its worth of $1,200,000 to you.

Considering the exceptional quality and value this product offers, we are pleased to extend an offer to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between our internal valuation and your perceived value, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction and benefit.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product's features, capabilities, or how it aligns with your specific requirements. We are committed to providing you with unparalleled service and support throughout the entire process.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
